ygData.subject: Re: shoulders...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I found the Tattered Mantle to be a very common drop -- you just need to hunt Gull. The last time I was in there, ever person in the group left
ygData.messageBody:
> the one from BW is from nezekezema/phurzicon spawn, a
> boring as hell camp that takes too much firepower to
> ward off the wanderers. I hope none of you have a
> mage friend that needs the burning embers. Camping
> his spawn point, We've had about 20 guts drop at least,
> 1 shoulder piece and finally the embers for the mage
> epic. your shoulders are quite rare.
>

Actually, I found the Tattered Mantle to be a very common drop -- you
just need to hunt Gull. The last time I was in there, ever person in
the group left with them.

Maybe we were just lucky? *Grins*

Gaelthorne
Xegony
